subject: Dear Sir,
body:
Dear Sir,
How are you doing today? Longest time I could not hear from you? I still need your help. I sent you form 
feel out the form return it back to me.
Best regards

subject: Re: Dear Sir,
body:
Hello,

I hope this message finds you well. It has indeed been a while since we last spoke. I'm curious to know what kind of help you need from me. Could you please provide more details about the form you mentioned? What is it for and how can I assist you with it?

Looking forward to hearing back from you.

Best wishes,
Sonia
